contentrichtext.text: {{ref improve|date=February 2013}} {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Messancy |picture=Messancy station.jpg |picture-legend=The railway station |map=Messancy Luxembourg Belgium Map.png |map-legend=Location of Messancy in Luxembourg province |arms=Armoiries de Messancy 2.svg |flag=Flag of Messancy.svg{{!}}border |region={{BE-REG-WAL}} |community={{BE-FR}} |province={{BE-PROV-LX}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Arlon|Arlon]] |nis=81015 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor=Roger Kirsch |majority=UC |postal-codes=6780-6782 |telephone-area=063 |web={{fr icon}} [http://www.messancy.be messancy.be] |lat_deg=49 |lat_min=35.7 |lon_deg=05 |lon_min=49.1 }} '''Messancy''' ([[German language|German]]: ''Metzig'', [[Luxembourgish language|Luxembourgish]]: ''Miezeg'', [[Walloon language|Walloon]]: ''Messanceye'') is a [[Wallonia|Walloon]] [[municipality]] of [[Belgium]] located in the [[Luxembourg (Belgium)|province of Luxembourg]]. On 1 January 2007 the municipality, which covers 52.43 km², had 7,466 inhabitants, giving a [[population density]] of 142.4 inhabitants per km². The commune of Messancy is composed of many villages : Wolkrange, Guelff, Sélange, Hondelange, Turpange, Bébange, Longeau, Habergy, Differt. <gallery> File:Monument Pierre Luttgens.jpg|''Les Insoumis'', whose provincial leader Pierre Luttgens died on 4 september 1944 ([[Athus]]). </gallery> ==References== {{reflist}} {{commonscat}} {{Municipalities in Luxembourg}} [[Category:Municipalities of Luxembourg (Belgium)]] {{LuxembourgBE-geo-stub}}
